FuncDef: This command specifies the type of matching done to identify a host. There are different match-types for PPPoE or IPoE hosts of which a maximum of four can be specified.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies up to four matching types to identify a host. Values-circuit-id, derived-id, dual-stack-remote-id, encap-tag-range, ip, mac, option60, remote-id, sap-id, service-id, string, system-id.
